cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value will cause ciphering configuration errors and security protocol failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting serverport to a negative value will cause RF simulator connection failures and prevent proper signal simulation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 serverport 設定為負值會導致 RF 模擬器連接失敗，並阻止正確的信號模擬。
